title: Only With You
description: ♥ Welcome to Hayden Falls ♥Only With You ~ Book TwoMiles Hamilton is at his breaking point.As a fireman, I was strong and sure. My goal was to be Fire Chief one day, and I was on course for my dream.My personal life, however, was a mess. My only regret was keeping her a secret. I don't know what ended us. I never got an explanation. Will I be able to fix things and win her back? I don't know. All I know is that I can't take it anymore. I need answers whether she's ready to give them to me or not. I'm about to become a thorn in her side.
author: Debbie Hyde
